name: NoteTaker
description: A quick EM that allows comments to be added to a single notes field, formatted with user and timestamp.

project-settings.name:
Note Taker Instructions

Each block for notes requires a minimum of three fields be configured

Click here for a an example input form

sub_settings.name:
Event id where the data is located
Must include both source and destination fields

Note Log Storage Field (either 'text' or 'textarea' field)
This field will contain the assembled log of all notes. It is typically @HIDDEN and its value is piped into another field for display (such as the input field below).

Input Field(s)(either 'text' or 'dropdown' or 'radio' or 'select many')
This field's value will be added to the note log field above on record save. You can have multiple fields if you like. The value of all fields will be cleared on each save.

Date Field last modified(text validated as date or date/time)
This field is typically @HIDDEN. Its value will be populated with the time of the last note entry and is useful for report filters
NOTE: Please remember to specify a validation type when customizing this field

Include a delimiter
If expecting longer input, you might want to add a delimiter between entries
